x-kubernetes-validations.rule: !('*' in self.managementPolicies || 'Create' in self.managementPolicies || 'Update' in self.managementPolicies) || has(self.forProvider.kafkaCluster) || (has(self.initProvider) && has(self.initProvider.kafkaCluster))

!('*' in self.managementPolicies || 'Create' in self.managementPolicies || 'Update' in self.managementPolicies) || has(self.forProvider.replicationInfoList) || (has(self.initProvider) && has(self.initProvider.replicationInfoList))

!('*' in self.managementPolicies || 'Create' in self.managementPolicies || 'Update' in self.managementPolicies) || has(self.forProvider.replicatorName) || (has(self.initProvider) && has(self.initProvider.replicatorName))
